CustomField.description: Count of received Opportunities with a Close Date in the current fiscal year. Includes hard and soft credits, excludes Planned Gifts. Calculated externally by the IT Data team and pushed into Salesforce nightly after qualifying changes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of all received Opportunities where the Close Date is this FY and Account has a hard or soft credit. (excludes Planned Gifts).
CustomField.label: # of Donations this FY
